attributes.additional_details:
We're reducing the size of our armed forces because of changing threats so the Government informs us!
We've postponed the introduction of our new Aircraft Carriers because we can't afford them!
We're faced with a Global Terrorist Threat. Groups of people hiding in large impoverished countries!
Why do we need a £20bn Nuclear deterrent?
We can't afford it!
Let the people decide, let's have a referendum.
